competitors.name: Tipalti
competitors.notes: Cloud-based AP platform founded in 2010, designed for mid-sized to enterprise companies with capabilities for multi-currency payments and global tax requirements

competitors.name: Traditional ERP Systems
competitors.notes: In 2010, Bill.com was still competing against manual AP processes and traditional ERP systems rather than specialized cloud-based competitors

context: BILL Holdings, Inc. is a financial operations platform for SMBs focused on accounts payable, accounts receivable, and spend management automation. Founded as Bill.com. Automating SMB financial operations.
